## TroveCreationParams type

Parameters of an [openTrove()](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.opentrove.md) transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TroveCreationParams<T = unknown> = _CollateralDeposit<T> & _NoCollateralWithdrawal & _DebtTokenBorrowing<T> & _NoDebtTokenRepayment;
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` specifies the allowed value type(s) of the particular `TroveCreationParams` object's properties.
